_header: Jesu upon a time he bade / His disciples as they were stead
_description: Gospel, ‘In Oct. apostolorum Petri et Pauli’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ihesu vppon a tyme he badHis disciplus as þei weore
                    stad…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…To þe Ioyes bi alle weiesWher of heore tonges ben made
                    keies
